meta.title_home: AI Translate Bot - Translate JSON Files with AI Precision
meta.description_home: Fast, accurate, and structure-preserving translations powered by Google's Gemini API
meta.description_translator: Translate your JSON data between multiple languages
meta.description_improver: Enhance and optimize your translated JSON data
meta.description_article: Translate long-form content like articles, blog posts, and documentation with high accuracy and natural language.
meta.description_download: Study vocabulary, learn new languages, and improve your memory using powerful AI and spaced repetition techniques.

hero.title: Translate Your JSON Files with AI Precision
hero.subtitle: Fast, accurate, and structure-preserving translations powered by Google's Gemini API

features.title: Powerful Translation Features
features.cardDescription0: Translate your JSON files between numerous languages while preserving the original structure.
features.cardDescription1: Optimized translation process with built-in rate limiting to ensure maximum throughput.
features.cardDescription2: Your API keys are stored locally and your data never leaves your browser except to call the API.
features.cardDescription3: Maintains your JSON structure perfectly, ensuring your application works flawlessly.
features.cardDescription4: Real-time progress tracking with detailed statistics and estimated completion times.
features.cardDescription5: Download translated files or copy directly to clipboard for seamless integration.

tools.title: Powerful Translation Tools
tools.subtitle: Choose the right tool for your translation needs
tools.cardDescription0: Translate entire JSON files while preserving structure and format. Perfect for localizing applications and websites.
tools.cardDescription1: Optimize and refine existing translations to be more concise and natural. Ideal for polishing machine translations.
tools.cardDescription2: Translate long-form content like articles, blog posts, and documentation with high accuracy and natural language.

cta.title: Ready to Translate Your Content?
cta.subtitle: Start using our powerful translation tools today and make your application accessible to users worldwide.

LanguageLearningBox.title: Want to learn a new language?
LanguageLearningBox.subtitle: Try Memoryto's AI-powered spaced repetition system!

translator.title: JSON Translation Tool
translator.subtitle: Translate your JSON data between multiple languages
translator.about: This application uses Google's Gemini API to translate JSON data while preserving structure. The translation is performed with built-in rate limiting to respect API quotas. For large translations, the process may take several minutes.
translator.rate_limit_description: The Gemini API has the following rate limits:
translator.prompt_description: Customize how the AI translates your content. Advanced users only.
translator.reset_prompt_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset to the default prompt?

improve-json.title: JSON Translation Improver
improve-json.subtitle: Enhance and optimize your translated JSON data
improve-json.about: This tool analyzes your source and translated JSON files, identifying translations that are significantly longer than the original text (over 120% of the source length). It then optimizes only those translations to be more concise while preserving meaning.
improve-json.invalid_json_file: Invalid JSON file. Please upload a valid JSON file.
improve-json.invalid_json_input: Invalid JSON input. Please check your JSON format.
improve-json.no_translations_need_improvement: No translations need improvement! All translations are already concise.
improve-json.length_threshold_description: Translations longer than {lengthThreshold}% of the source text will be improved for conciseness.

translate-article.title: Article Translator
translate-article.subtitle: Translate long-form content like articles, blog posts, and documentation with high accuracy and natural language.
translate-article.about: This tool uses Google's Gemini API to translate long-form content like articles, blog posts, and documentation with high accuracy and natural language.
translate-article.invalid_article_file: Invalid article file. Please upload a valid article file.
translate-article.invalid_article_input: Invalid article input. Please check your article format.
translate-article.please_enter_text_to_translate: Please enter some text to translate.

download.description: Study vocabulary, learn new languages, and improve your memory using powerful AI and spaced repetition techniques.
